bilingual.source: They tended to perceive irregular beeps as a threat.
bilingual.target: 他们倾向于认为不规则的嘟嘟声是一种威胁。

bilingual.source: It also helps to opt for clothes you perceive as tying in with your goals.
bilingual.target: 选择你认为与你的目标相关的衣服也会有所帮助。

bilingual.source: I don't perceive what I'm drawing as ice or water.
bilingual.target: 我认为我画的不仅仅是冰或是水。

bilingual.source: Parents often perceive English-medium schools to be of higher quality.
bilingual.target: 家长一般认为英语学校质素较高。

bilingual.source: You are going to have a lot of experiences, some you perceive as good and some that you perceive as bad.
bilingual.target: 在这一天你会经历很多事，有些经历你认为是好的，也有些你认为是坏的。

bilingual.source: Parents often perceive English - medium schools to be of higher quality.
bilingual.target: 家长一般认为英语学校质素较高.

bilingual.source: We tend to perceive a bluish shade as whiter than other shades.
bilingual.target: 我们往往会认为蓝色投影比其它色调的投影要白些。

bilingual.source: So I think we all perceive the passage of time in very similar ways.
bilingual.target: 所以我认为我们所有人知觉时间推移的方式非常类似。

bilingual.source: When you show genuine interest in someone, they perceive you as interesting.
bilingual.target: 当你对某人表现出真诚的兴趣时，他们会认为你很有趣。

bilingual.source: Do your bosses or fellow managers perceive you as soft and overly accommodating?
bilingual.target: 你的老板和同事是否认为你是一个过分宽松和温和的人？

list.abstract: perceive（英[pəˈsiːv]，美[pərˈsiːv]），英语单词。做动词用，指认识到、意识到、理解等。英语短语有perceive difference（感知差异），例句为Robots can be programmed to perceive potential perils.（机器人可以通过编程来感知潜在的危险。） 及物动词类的近义词有detect、feel、absorb等，不及物动词类的近义词有to feel、come to realize。

yingyinNormal.en: In what I can only perceive as a tactical move to destroy me, he is with Wolowitz and Koothrappali setting up her stereo.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我认为是旨在毁灭我而进行的战略行动，他跟库萨帕里和沃罗威茨在帮她装音响。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe it's some evidence, some artifact of a higher dimension that we can't consciously perceive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许是一些证据，一些更高维度的文明，只是我们目前还不能感知。

yingyinNormal.en: You can get help from others who are good at what you're not, who are wired to perceive things you can't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可以寻求他人帮助弥补你的不足，看到你发现不了的地方。

yingyinNormal.en: No, but your ability to perceive their existence is conditional on you passing the second and third barriers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，但对你来说卧室的存在是有条件的，你要通过第二和第三关。

yingyinNormal.en: We create and perceive our world simultaneously. And our mind does this so well that we don't even know it's happening.
yingyinNormal.zh: 同时创造和认知我们的精神世界。过程如此畅顺 令人毫不知情。

yingyinNormal.en: In the same way, mothers perceive their biological children's poop as less offensive than others, which allows them to take care of them without disgust.
yingyinNormal.zh: 同样的道理，妈妈们不会觉得自己的小孩便便很臭，这样才能好好的照顾他们，而不会感到反胃。

yingyinNormal.en: Humans fancy that there's something special about the way we perceive the world, and yet we live in loops as tight and as closed as the hosts do, seldom questioning our choices, content, for the most part, to be told what to do next.
yingyinNormal.zh: 人类总幻想我们有着一种独特感知世界的方式，然而我们几乎和接待员一模一样，是生活在循环之中，极少质疑我们的选择和满足，在很多时候都是照着别人的意愿行事。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 认为；感觉；（perceive的过去式和过去分词）

word_family.mean: v. 认识到；意识到；理解；把…看作；认为；感觉；察觉；看出

sense_info_list.en: interpret or look on someone or something in a particular way

examination_example.sentence: For another, it may be to be <highlight>perceived</highlight> as more approachable, or more modern and stylish.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一方面，它可能被认为更平易近人，或者更现代、更时尚。

examination_example.sentence: The consequence is that you <highlight>perceive</highlight> that the trip has taken less time than it actually has.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 结果是，你觉得旅行花的时间比实际花的时间要少。

examination_example.sentence: They are our happy glasses that protect us from what we <highlight>perceive</highlight> is going to be more dangerous.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们就像是快乐的“眼睛”保护我们远离我们所认为存在的危险。

sense_info_list.en: become aware or conscious of something; come to realize or understand

examination_example.sentence: How the whole image is then assembled and <highlight>perceived</highlight> is still a mystery although it is the subject of current research.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管整个图像是当前研究的主题，但它是如何被组合和感知的仍然是一个谜。

examination_example.sentence: People who <highlight>perceived</highlight> greater social support were less likely to come down with a cold.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 感知到更多社会支持的人，患感冒的可能性更小。

examination_example.sentence: Researchers examined the effects of <highlight>perceived</highlight> social support and the receipt of hugs on the participants' susceptibility to developing the common cold.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员考察了，感知社会支持和接受拥抱，对于参与者患普通感冒的易感性的影响。

word_usage.usage:
表示“把某人或某事视为/认为/理解为...”，常用搭配：
perceive sb./sth. as  ...
(sb./sth.) be perceived as ...
(sb./sth.) be perceived to do ...
以下3句含义一致，表示：我们把这个发现视为一项重大突破。
We perceived this discovery as a major breakthrough.
This discovery was perceived  (by us) as a major breakthrough.
This discovery was perceived  (by us) to be a major breakthrough.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“察觉、感到、发觉、理解”。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 认为；感觉；（perceive的过去式和过去分词）

word_family.mean: v. 认识到；意识到；理解；把…看作；认为；感觉；察觉；看出

sense_info_list.en: become aware or conscious of something; come to realize or understand

examination_example.sentence: During critical situations, especially when a threat is <highlight>perceived</highlight>, the outer core loses control and fails to regulate the impulses and instinctual responses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在危急情况下，特别是当感知到威胁时，外核失去控制，无法调节冲动和本能反应。

examination_example.sentence: There's also evidence that drawing talent is based on how accurately someone <highlight>perceives</highlight> the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 还有证据表明，绘画天赋是基于一个人对世界的感知有多准确。

examination_example.sentence: Robots can be programmed to <highlight>perceive</highlight> potential perils.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 机器人可以通过编程来感知潜在的危险。

sense_info_list.en: interpret or look on someone or something in a particular way

examination_example.sentence: From this, the researchers came up with four main causes of why some managers are <highlight>perceived</highlight> as being simply awful at their jobs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据此，研究人员归纳出了一些管理者在工作中被认为很糟糕的四个主要原因。

examination_example.sentence: They were also asked to rate the extent to which they <highlight>perceived</highlight> their supervisors to be helpful.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们还被要求评估他们认为他们的主管对他们的帮助程度。

examination_example.sentence: The Amish are often <highlight>perceived</highlight> by other Americans to be relics of the past who live a simple, inflexible life dedicated to inconvenient out-dated customs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 阿尔什民族通常普遍被人们看作是一种过去遗留的遗产，因为他们总是过着一种单调，又不便捷的生活，他们把一生都致力于那种不方便的生活和老旧（不合时宜）的习俗中。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: interpret or look on someone or something in a particular way

examination_example.sentence: Physical contact between unfamiliar people is negatively <highlight>perceived</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不熟悉的人之间的身体接触被认为是消极的。

examination_example.sentence: If you do several jobs in a relatively short span of time, prospective employers might <highlight>perceive</highlight> that you lack loyalty.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你在相对较短的时间内做了几份工作，潜在的雇主可能会认为你缺乏忠诚度。

examination_example.sentence: Like cats, babies appear to engage in what's called "preferential looking"— looking longer at things that are interesting or unusual than things they <highlight>perceive</highlight> as normal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 和猫一样，婴儿似乎也会进行所谓的“优先寻找”，即比起它们认为正常的事物，它们看有趣或不寻常的事物的时间更长。

sense_info_list.en: become aware or conscious of something; come to realize or understand

examination_example.sentence: Labor market success is partly based on how employers and customers <highlight>perceive</highlight> your body image, no one had explored the other side of the question.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 劳动力市场的成功部分是基于雇主和顾客如何看待你的身体形象，没有人探索过问题的另一面。

examination_example.sentence: Self-<highlight>perceived</highlight> weight can influence self-esteem (自尊心) , mental health and health behaviors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自我感知的体重会影响自尊心、心理健康和健康行为。

examination_example.sentence: Women in our sample tend to over-<highlight>perceive</highlight> their weight—they think they're heavier than they are—while men tend to under-<highlight>perceive</highlight> theirs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们样本中的女性倾向于高估自己的体重——她们认为自己比实际体重重——而男性倾向于低估自己的体重。

sample.mean: n. 感知能力；认识能力；感知；看法；感觉；认识；感受；观念；印象；直觉
adj. 有感知能力的；有洞察力的
adj. 感知的；感觉的
adj. 长期的；永久的；持久的；多年生的；反复的；一再的；定型的；不变的；常年的；终年的

exam_freq_info.chinese: 察觉; 发觉; 注意到

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
